sentences.sentence: Only by facing and overcoming difficulties in our life can we grow up happily and healthily.
sentences.translation: 只有面对和克服生活中的困难，我们才能快乐健康地成长。

sentences.sentence: When people are young, meeting and overcoming challenges will make them strong and ready to face life.
sentences.translation: 当人们年轻的时候，迎接和克服挑战会使他们变得坚强，并且为面对生活做好准备。

sentences.sentence: After overcoming this one-sidedness, they will take a big step forward.
sentences.translation: 克服了这种片面性，他们就会大进一步。
